feed.title: Hosted Private Cloud Status - Incident History

entry.title: [Global][Dedicated Cloud] - End of Life Dedicated Cloud
entry.content:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Sep 30, 12:00 UTC  -  Dec 20, 20:29 UTC

Jul 25, 13:27 UTC
Scheduled - End of Life Dedicated Cloud: 30 September 2022
We informed you in October 2021 that our Dedicad Cloud service will reach its end of life and will be discontinued the 30st September 2022. This step is important for your VMware platforms to improve the quality of service, performance, and security of your clusters. Indeed, "Dedicated Cloud" hardware used, pre-2016, does not allow us to provide the best level of service and integration with new modern architectures of VMware.
Following our previous email, many customers started to plan and/or to migrate and we encourage you to do the same to avoid the September deadline.

Guide to migrating to a new infrastructure:
https://docs.ovh.com/gb/en/private-cloud/vdc-migration/

entry.title: [Global][VMware Private Cloud] - VMware NSX operation
entry.content:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Sep 5, 06:00 UTC  -  Sep 9, 17:00 UTC

Aug 29, 22:08 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 05/09/2022 06:00 UTC
End time : 09/09/2022 17:00 UTC
Service impact : Customers may lose access to their Vcenter management and hosts will be in maintenance mode during the maintenance.
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, we are rolling an update for VMware NSX related product.

entry.title: [GLOBAL][VMware Private Cloud] - Hosted Private Cloud Invoice update

THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Sep 1, 07:00 UTC  -  Sep 8, 19:00 UTC

Aug 30, 21:02 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 01/09/2022 07:00 UTC
End time : 08/09/2022 19:00 UTC
Service impact : None
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy of our Hosted Private Cloud infrastructure, we will be doing an internal maintenance which involves doing an update to the Hosted Private Cloud invoice, by adding a new line at the end of the bill.

entry.title: [SBG][Hosted Private Cloud] - Network equipement replacement
entry.content:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Aug 31, 20:00 - 22:00 UTC

Aug 31, 16:08 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 31/08/2022 20:00 UTC
End time : 31/08/2022 22:00 UTC
Service impact : loss of High Availability
Service improvement : Following our continuous improvement policy, a network equipment will be replaced.
Clusters will be running on master nodes during the maintenance since slaves nodes aren't double attached.

Resolved - Start Time :18/08/2022 02:20 UTC
End Time :18/08/2022 07:30 UTC

Aug 18, 07:44 UTC
Update - UPDATE: Due to difficulties to access NSX and VCSA infrastructures, our technical teams have remounted the Virtual Machines and the services are back in order.
We apologize to all who are affected by the disruption.

Aug 18, 02:50 UTC

entry.title: [Global][Hosted Private Cloud] - Operation task
entry.content:
Aug 12, 10:12 UTC
Resolved - Start Time : 12/08/2022 07:52 UTC
End Time : 12/08/2022 08:27 UTC
Service impact : All services are back in operation
Root cause :A server of the cluster managing the tasks has bugged causing a failure on the cluster. Our teams have restored the cluster. They are now investigating to understand the origin of this bug and fix it on the responsible server. We apologize for the inconvenience caused

Aug 12, 08:47 UTC
Monitoring - Start time : 12/08/2022 07:52 UTC
Service impact : All services are back in operation
Ongoing actions : Our technical teams monitor the status of services

Aug 12, 08:33 UTC
Update - The services should be operational in less than fifteen minutes.

Aug 12, 08:21 UTC
Investigating - Start time : 12/08/2022 07:52 UTC
Service impact : All Hosted Private Cloud operations may encounter disruptions.
Ongoing actions : Our technicians are currently working on in order to fix it
